displayName.english: Dead Shields - Thou Shalt Not Shield

description.english: Finish the mission on any difficulty.

displayName.english: Dead Shields â€“ No Tricks Needed

description.english: Don't drop the shield with a paralyzer.
Find all tablets and orbs in the mission.

displayName.english: Dead Shields â€“ Saved the Best for Last

description.english: Destroy the supporter as your last target.

displayName.english: Holes in space and time - New Tricks

description.english: Finish the mission on any difficulty.

displayName.english: Holes in space and time â€“ Practice Leads to Mastery

description.english: Destroy the supersoldier in under one minute from the start of the fight.

displayName.english: Holes in space and time â€“ No Touching!

description.english: Don't let any ninja attack you with a melee weapon.

displayName.english: Holes in space and time â€“ Jumped to his Death

description.english: Kill a jumping ninja.

displayName.english: Charge the ambush - No More Russian

description.english: Finish the mission on any difficulty.

displayName.english: Charge the ambush â€“ Need More Data

description.english: Find all tablets in the mission.

displayName.english: Charge the ambush â€“ No Reinforcements Allowed

description.english: Kill summoner before he summons more than 5 zombies.

displayName.english: Charge the ambush â€“ Ambushing the Ambushers

description.english: Don't lose more than half health during the ambush phase.
Finish the mission on any difficulty.

displayName.english: Catching up â€“ Mano a Mano

description.english: Kill your ex-boss with a melee weapon.

displayName.english: Catching up â€“ No Cyber Needed

description.english: Don't use active abilities during the fight with the ex-boss.
Destroy all reinforcements waiting to be summoned from at least one anchor.

displayName.english: Smaller than I expected - Big Hopes in a Small Boat

description.english: Finish the mission on any difficulty.

displayName.english: Smaller than I expected â€“ Divide and Conquer

description.english: Don't kill any supersoldier until they are all at or below one-third health.

displayName.english: Smaller than I expected â€“ Making Paratroopers

description.english: Finish all supersoldiers with a hit from a paralyzer.

displayName.english: Smaller than I expected â€“ Retirement Funds

description.english: Collect all money in the mission.

displayName.english: Ready to blow - Faster than Light

description.english: Finish the mission on any difficulty.

displayName.english: Ready to blow â€“ Pack Member

description.english: Don't shoot any dog while they're on your side.

displayName.english: Ready to blow â€“ Jump Assist

description.english: Kill at least one ninja with an explosive weapon.
Don't kill any enemy while the dogs are hunting.

displayName.english: In a blaze of glory - Blow up the Universe

description.english: Finish the mission on any difficulty.

displayName.english: In a blaze of glory â€“ Friend or Foe

description.english: Don't kill any zombie on your side.

displayName.english: In a blaze of glory â€“ Best Enemies Forever

description.english: Kill the hacked boss

displayName.english: In a blaze of glory â€“ Protector

description.english: Protect Minikin from enemies.

displayName.english: To the shores of Tau Ceti - Run, Cyborg, Run!

description.english: Finish the mission on any difficulty.

displayName.english: To the shores of Tau Ceti â€“ Last Mementos

description.english: Collect all money, tablets and orbs from the level.

displayName.english: To the shores of Tau Ceti â€“ Just Run!

description.english: Don't kill anyone until you reach the first elevator.

displayName.english: To the shores of Tau Ceti â€“ Bullet Dodger

description.english: Don't let your health drop to less than 80%.

displayName.english: It ends here and now - The Twin at the End

description.english: Finish the mission on any difficulty.

description.english: Use just one weapon and abilities to win.

displayName.english: It ends here and now â€“ Paralyzing End

description.english: Finish the story with one paralyzer shot.

displayName.english: It ends here and now â€“ Bug Squasher

description.english: Deal at least 30% of total damage to a spider with an explosive weapon.
